name: Kinetis (Corsam, Samuel Gay-Obadia, Leo Compe, Aldaberto-Cuello)
name_original: Kinetis (Corsam, Samuel Gay-Obadia, Leo Compe, Aldaberto-Cuello)
description:
• Fight in the arena against other warriors.
  • Use the power of kinetis to push your opponents into spikes.
  • Try to entertain the audience to gain the best score.

Kinetis is a 3D Brawler where you have to fight warriors by pushing them into spikes. It's recommended to play with a controller.

The game was made over 2 months at ISART Digital Paris by a 7 people team.

Credits

Game design:

  • Leo COMPE
  • Aldaberto CUELLO
  • Samuel GAY
  • Corentin SAMANIEGO

Game Programming:

  • Duncan FORTUNA
  • Nathan LEPEC
  • Johan MENARD
